Comparisons

Source: vignettes/comparisons.Rmd
comparisons.Rmd
library(zazou)
#> Registered S3 method overwritten by 'treeio':
#>   method     from
#>   root.phylo ape
library(ape)
set.seed(42)

Parameters

tree <- read.tree(text = "(((A:1,B:1):1,C:2):1,(D:1,E:1):2);")
true_shifts <- c(0, -3, 0, 0, 0, 0, -2, 0)
alpha <- 1
lambda <- 0.1
(true_zscores <- incidence_matrix(tree) %*% true_shifts)
#>   [,1]
#> A   -3
#> B   -3
#> C    0
#> D   -2
#> E    0

Simulations

observed_zscores <- simu_zscores(tree = tree, shifts = true_shifts, 
                                 alpha = 1, graph = TRUE)
#> Warning: Removed 7 rows containing missing values (geom_label).

observed_zscores
#>         [,1]
#> A -1.6290416
#> B -3.7540090
#> C  0.3519108
#> D -1.3671374
#> E  0.3228558

Comparisons

L-BFGS-B algorithm

mthd1 <- estimate_shifts2(Delta0 = rep(0, 8), zscores = observed_zscores, 
                          lambda = lambda, tree = tree, alpha = alpha)
mthd1
#> Tree is binary with 5 leafs and 8 branches
#> Covariance matrix has been estimated from an OU with alpha = 1 and sigma = 1.418 
#> ---
#> Optimisation algorithm: L-BFGS-B
#> Regularization parameter: lambda = 0.1 
#> Objective value: 0.621.
#> BIC: 0.546
#> ---
#> Estimated shifts: 0 -1.621 0 -2.038 0 0 -1.312 0 ...
#> 3 shifts have been identified (ie 62.5 % of sparsity)
#> A parsimonious solution would involve 3 shifts
#> ---
#> Observed z-scores:  -1.629 -3.754 0.352 -1.367 0.323 
#> Estimated z-scores: -1.621  -3.66     0 -1.312     0 
#> 3 z-scores have been shifted (ie 40 % of sparsity)
plot(mthd1)
#> Warning: Removed 6 rows containing missing values (geom_label).

Shooting algorithm

set.seed(41)
mthd2 <- estimate_shifts2(Delta0 = rep(0, 8), zscores = observed_zscores, 
                          lambda = lambda, tree = tree, alpha = alpha, 
                          method = "shooting2")
mthd2
#> Tree is binary with 5 leafs and 8 branches
#> Covariance matrix has been estimated from an OU with alpha = 1 and sigma = 1.418 
#> ---
#> Optimisation algorithm: shooting
#> Regularization parameter: lambda = 0.1 
#> Objective value: 0.621.
#> BIC: 0.546
#> ---
#> Estimated shifts: 0 -1.621 0 -2.038 0 0 -1.312 0 ...
#> 3 shifts have been identified (ie 62.5 % of sparsity)
#> A parsimonious solution would involve 3 shifts
#> ---
#> Observed z-scores:  -1.629 -3.754 0.352 -1.367 0.323 
#> Estimated z-scores: -1.621  -3.66     0 -1.312     0 
#> 3 z-scores have been shifted (ie 40 % of sparsity)
plot(mthd2)
#> Warning: Removed 6 rows containing missing values (geom_label).

set.seed(41)
mthd3 <- estimate_shifts2(Delta0 = rep(0, 8), zscores = observed_zscores, 
                          lambda = lambda, tree = tree, alpha = alpha, 
                          method = "shooting3")
mthd3
#> Tree is binary with 5 leafs and 8 branches
#> Covariance matrix has been estimated from an OU with alpha = 1 and sigma = 1.418 
#> ---
#> Optimisation algorithm: shooting
#> Regularization parameter: lambda = 0.1 
#> Objective value: 0.621.
#> BIC: 0.546
#> ---
#> Estimated shifts: 0 -1.621 0 -2.038 0 0 -1.312 0 ...
#> 3 shifts have been identified (ie 62.5 % of sparsity)
#> A parsimonious solution would involve 3 shifts
#> ---
#> Observed z-scores:  -1.629 -3.754 0.352 -1.367 0.323 
#> Estimated z-scores: -1.621  -3.66     0 -1.312     0 
#> 3 z-scores have been shifted (ie 40 % of sparsity)
plot(mthd3)
#> Warning: Removed 6 rows containing missing values (geom_label).

mthd2$objective_value
#> [1] 0.6211019
mthd3$objective_value
#> [1] 0.6211018
mthd2$optim_info
#> $iterations
#> [1] 200
mthd3$optim_info
#> $iterations
#> [1] 231
#> 
#> $last_progress
#> [1] 3.440292e-09

Results

Shifts

#> [1]  0 -3  0  0  0  0 -2  0

#> [1]  0.000000 -1.621335  0.000000 -2.038286  0.000000  0.000000 -1.311911
#> [8]  0.000000
mthd2$shift_est
#> [1]  0.000000 -1.621439  0.000000 -2.038079  0.000000  0.000000 -1.311911
#> [8]  0.000000

Z-scores

t(true_zscores)
#>       A  B C  D E
#> [1,] -3 -3 0 -2 0

#> -1.621335 -3.659621  0.000000 -1.311911  0.000000
mthd2$zscores_est
#>         A         B         C         D         E 
#> -1.621439 -3.659518  0.000000 -1.311911  0.000000

Objective

mthd1$objective_value
